metadata.description: Trade Wars 2002 comprehensive prompt/menu rules - full gameplay coverage
metadata.coverage: login, navigation, trading, combat (retreat/surrender/capture/tow), banking, planets (citadel/colonists/build/shields), corporations, tavern, CIM, computer, underground, weapons (disruptor/limpets/beacons/probes/genesis/atomic), ships (catalog/equipment/yard), aliens (Ferrengi), sector hazards (nebula/blackhole/asteroid), towing, mail, rankings, T-warp, help, bounty, special locations (StarDock/Hardware/McPlasma), cloaking, scanning, avoid sectors, settings

prompts.notes: TW2002 Corporate Listings menu - appears early in game, send Q to exit
TWGS character creation final prompt - exclude when command prompt visible
TWGS character creation ship/sector selection - requires Enter after choice
TWGS character creation gender prompt - needs Enter after M/F
TWGS character creation real name prompt
TWGS character creation confirmation - exclude when password or gender visible
TWGS new character name prompt - must match before generic login_name
Username/handle prompt at login - exclude when later creation prompts visible
Simple [Pause] anywhere on screen - but not on login/menu screens with password prompts or game selection

llm_hints.screen_buffer_warning: [Pause] may appear in ANSI art at TOP of screen buffer (stale). Check if [Pause] is on the LAST LINE before treating as actual pause prompt.
llm_hints.stuck_detection: If seeing same pause repeatedly without progress, try sending Q or ESC to escape nested menus.

prompts.notes: TW2002 game menu (T to play, etc.)
Yes/No confirmation - exclude when later creation prompts or ship selection visible
Sector command prompt - with validated sector/credits extraction

llm_hints.screen_buffer_warning: Screen buffer may contain OLD sector numbers from previous screens. Use re.findall() and take LAST match, not re.search() which finds FIRST match.
llm_hints.parsing_pattern: For sector: re.findall(r'\\[(\\d+)\\]', screen)[-1]. For credits: pattern 'You have X credits' or 'Credits: X'.

prompts.notes: Port action menu - with validated sector extraction

match.pattern: (?i)which item do you wish to buy\?

prompts.notes: TWGS game selection menu - matches 'Selection (? for menu):' or game options

llm_hints.pending_trade_tracking: Set pending_trade=True when entering non-zero quantity. Set pending_trade=False when entering 0 or skipping. Only accept price offers when pending_trade is True.
llm_hints.screen_buffer_warning: Screen buffer may have old content. Use last match when parsing numbers.

llm_hints.pending_trade_check: Only accept/negotiate prices if pending_trade=True. Skip price screens when pending_trade=False (we entered 0 quantity).
llm_hints.response_format: Send Enter (\r) to accept default price, NOT 'Y'. 'Y' is for accept/reject confirmations.

prompts.notes: Warping - enter destination sector with current sector context

match.pattern: (?i)what do you want to name your ship

prompts.notes: TW2002 new character ship naming prompt

match.pattern: (?i)what do you want to name your (home )?planet

prompts.notes: TW2002 new character planet naming prompt
TW2002 new character name selection (N for new, B for BBS)
TEDIT General Editor One - core game settings
TEDIT General Editor Two - advanced settings
Combat - number of fighters to deploy

llm_hints.pending_trade_check: Only respond to price negotiation if pending_trade=True. If we skipped a commodity (entered 0), ignore price screens.
llm_hints.response_format: For 'Your offer [X]?' prompts, send Enter (\r) to accept the default price in brackets.

prompts.notes: Computer main menu - access to CIM, port reports, etc.
CIM (Computer Interrogation Mode) - machine-readable data dumps
Grimy Trader intelligence service - paid information
Grimy Trader topic selection (TRADER, FEDERATION, MAFIA)
Underground area (accessed via Grimy Trader MAFIA password)
